text.section: After receipt of a petition under § 12-308 of this subtitle, the legislative body of the county or municipal corporation shall order an investigation and a report on the petition.

section.section: Engineering details and cost estimates included in the report may not be in any greater detail than necessary for the formulation of a judgment on the feasibility and expense of the proposed conversion.

text.section:
The report shall be available to the public:
when the notice required under § 12-309 of this subtitle is published; and
at the public hearing, if held, established in the notice.
